mapper.sql: id, equipment_status, project_id, period, parameter, create_at, creater, modify_at, modifier
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_equipment
id,
equipment_status,
project_id,
period,
parameter,
create_at,
creater,
modify_at,
modifier,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_equipment
equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parameter = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_at = #{modifyAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_equipment set equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_at = #{modifyAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_equipment te left join tb_project tp on te.project_id = tp.id where 1=1

select te.id as id, tp.name as name, tp.longitude as longitude, tp.latitude as latitude, te.equipment_status as equipmentStatus, te.period as period, te.parameter as parameter, te.create_at as createAt from tb_equipment te left join tb_project tp on te.project_id = tp.id where 1=1
limit #{startRow}, #{endRow}
select te.*, tp.name, tp.city from tb_equipment te left join tb_project tp on te.project_id = tp.id where 1=1
